content: US President Donald Trump hailed Charlie Kirk as a "martyr for truth" on Wednesday while assailing the "radical left," suggesting its rhetoric contributed to the death of the conservative activist.

title: Musk Is World's Richest Person Again After Briefly Losing Title To Ellison
content: Elon Musk temporarily lost his position as the world's richest person on Wednesday, overtaken for a few hours by Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison.

title: "No Form Of Legal Immigration Has..." What Charlie Kirk Said On Indians In US
content: Amid the Utah horror, Charlie Kirk's recent remarks on Indian migrants, stating "America does not need more visas for people from India", have resurfaced. Kirk said that the US is "full" and it is time the country puts its own people first.

title: Nepal Protest LIVE Updates: Nepal Remains Under Curfew After 25 Killed In Violent Anti-Government Protests
content: Nepal Protest LIVE: Nepal remained under nationwide restrictive orders and curfew on Thursday after deadly 'Gen-z' protests rocked the small Himalayan nation earlier this week.

title: PM Modi To Visit Uttarakhand Today To Inspect Flood-Hit Areas
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit Uttarakhand on Thursday to review the devastation caused by the relentless monsoon that has battered every district of the state.

content: US right-wing political activist Charlie Kirk was part of a constellation of influencers who helped amplify Republican President Donald Trump's agenda, galvanizing conservative youth and rising to international prominence

title: Colorado High School Shooting: Student Dies After Wounding 2 Peers
content: A student shot two of his peers Wednesday at a suburban Denver high school before shooting himself and later dying, authorities said.

title: Charlie Kirk Assassination Updates: Trump Ally Shot Dead At US University, President Assures Action
content: Charlie Kirk Assassination Updates: Charlie Kirk, a conservative activist and close ally of US President Donald Trump, was shot dead at a Utah college event.

title: Who Was Charlie Kirk? Trump Supporter, Young Hero Of US Conservatives
content: Charlie Kirk, who was fatally shot at a US university on Wednesday, was the eloquent spokesman for a younger generation of Donald Trump's hard-right Republican movement.

title: Israeli Strike "killed Any Hope" For Gaza Hostages, Says Qatar PM
content: Qatar's prime minister said Wednesday that an Israeli strike in Doha on Hamas killed hope for hostages in Gaza as he called for his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu to be "brought to justice."

title: Glitch On Air India Singapore-Bound Plane, Fliers Deplaned At Delhi Airport
content: More than 200 passengers on a Singapore-bound Air India plane faced a tough time at the Delhi airport on Wednesday evening as all of them were deplaned after being seated in the aircraft for nearly two hours with a faulty air conditioning system.

title: "Person Taken Into Custody In Charlie Kirk Killing Released": Kash Patel
content: A person taken into custody on suspicion of involvement in Wednesday's assassination of far-right activist Charlie Kirk has been released, the FBI director said hours after announcing the detention.

title: Officials Give Conflicting Statements On Suspect In Charlie Kirk Shooting
content: US authorities have detained a suspect in the fatal shooting of right-wing activist Charlie Kirk, FBI Director Kash Patel said Wednesday, following the attack at a university in Utah.

title: Trump Ally, Right-Wing Activist, Charlie Kirk Shot Dead At University Event
content: Charlie Kirk, the CEO and co-founder of the conservative youth organization Turning Point USA, was shot Wednesday at an event at a Utah college, Turning Point said.

title: "The Great And Legendary": Trump Pays Tribute To Close Ally Charlie Kirk
content: US President Donald Trump announced on social media that conservative activist Charlie Kirk has died after he was shot in the neck while speaking at a Utah Valley University event. Trump said that Kirk "was loved and admired by ALL."

title: NASA Blocks Chinese Citizens From Working On Space Programs
content: NASA has begun barring Chinese nationals with valid visas from joining its programs, underscoring the intensifying space race between the rival powers.

title: Qatar Says Netanyahu Must Be "Brought To Justice" Over Strikes In Doha
content: Qatar's prime minister said Wednesday that an Israeli strike in Doha on Hamas killed hope for hostages in Gaza as he called for his Israeli counterpart Benjamin Netanyahu to be "brought to justice."

title: Trump Told Netanyahu Striking Hamas Inside Qatar Was Not Wise: Report
content: U.S. President Donald Trump told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that his decision to target Hamas inside Qatar wasn't wise, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing senior administration officials.

title: "Act Without Delay": Thadou Tribe Seeks Action Against Kuki Insurgents In Assam, Writes To Chief Minister
content: Members of the Thadou tribe held a protest in Assam's Guwahati on Wednesday seeking justice for Thadou leader Nehkam Jomhao, who was tortured and killed by Kuki insurgents in Karbi Anglong last month.

content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed defensemen tiers and a guide to the position.

title: Bullet came from rooftop? Key Trump ally fatally shot at college campus - 10 things to know
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk, a close ally of US President Donald Trump, was fatally shot during a campus event in Utah. Utah's governor called it a political assassination. Kirk, 31, was speaking at Utah Valley University when he was shot in the neck and later died. The incident prompted widespread condemnation and flags were ordered to be flown at half-staff.

title: RJD leader Rajkumar Rai shot dead outside his house; 6 bullet shells recovered
content: "The deceased, a resident of Vaishali Raghopur, currently lived in Munna Chak, had returned from some work in a four-wheeler and started buying some food items from a hotel in the street just before his house, when the criminals fired six bullets at him, due to which he fell on the ground. On receiving the information of the incident, the Chitragupt Nagar police station, located at a distance of a few steps, reached the spot," Parichay Kumar said.

title: Delhi airport: 200 flyers left sweating as Singapore-bound Boeing's electricals fail
content: Over 200 passengers on an Air India flight to Singapore faced a distressing ordeal at Delhi airport. Due to malfunctioning air conditioning and electrical systems on Wednesday night, passengers were stuck inside the Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner for nearly two hours. The discomfort led to passengers using newspapers as fans before being deplaned.

title: Charlie Kirk assassination: Bullet struck as Trump ally spoke on gang violence; his chilling last words
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk, a prominent Trump ally, was fatally shot at a Utah Valley University event while discussing gun violence. Kirk's final words, "Counting or not counting gang violence?", highlighted the irony. Donald Trump mourned Kirk's death, calling it an "assassination" and praising him as a patriot. The incident occurred during a Q&A session, sparking widespread shock and grief.

title: Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs assets: Karisma's kids challenge will; mother calls process ‚Äòunholy‚Äô
content: The Delhi High Court is hearing a suit filed by Karisma Kapoor's children, claiming a share in their late father Sunjay Kapur's estate. Priya Kapur, Sunjay's widow, stated the children received ‚Çπ1,900 crore from a family trust. The children challenge Sunjay's will, which Priya defends as valid despite being unregistered.

title: World‚Äôs richest reshuffle: Ellison tops Musk; Oracle‚Äôs 41% rally drives $101bn gain
content: Larry Ellison, Oracle's co-founder, has surpassed Elon Musk to become the world's richest person in 2025. Oracle's stock soared after a record-breaking earnings report, increasing Ellison's net worth by $101 billion in a single day, reaching $393 billion. Tesla's declining share value contributed to Musk's drop to $385 billion, ending his reign at the top.

title: 'Dump truck': India calls out Pakistan‚Äôs ‚Äòhypocrisy‚Äô at UNHRC
content: India strongly criticized Pakistan at the UN Human Rights Council, labeling it a "terror sponsor" that funds networks threatening global security. Kshitij Tyagi highlighted Pakistan's hypocrisy, recalling the Pahalgam attack and its sheltering of Osama bin Laden.

title: Odisha lecturer assaults wife, teacher over affair suspicion; arrested
content: In a shocking incident in Puri district, a college lecturer and his associate were arrested for allegedly assaulting and publicly humiliating his wife and another man. Accused of having an affair, the victims were stripped, paraded on a busy road, and forced to exchange garlands. The disturbing video of the incident went viral, sparking widespread outrage.Puri horror: Lecturer assaults wife, teacher over affair suspicion; strips, parades them on street

title: 'Won't spare ...': Trump blames 'radical left' for Charlie Kirk's killing; vows action
content: President Trump mourned the assassination of Charlie Kirk, labelling him a "martyr for truth" and condemning the act as a "dark moment" for America. He vowed to hold accountable those responsible, including organisations supporting political violence. Trump also criticised the "radical left," claiming their rhetoric fueled the tragedy and urged Americans to uphold values like free speech and the rule of law in Kirk's memory.

title: The iPhone that Apple 'killed' after three years
content: Apple has discontinued the Plus-sized iPhone after a three-year run, replacing it with the new, slimmer, and lighter Air model priced at $999. The Plus, like the Mini before it, failed to attract enough buyers, as consumers preferred either the standard iPhone or the Pro models with enhanced features.

title: Punjab: AAP MLA Manjinder Lalpura & 6 cops among 11 found guilty of molestation
content: AAP MLA Manjinder Singh Lalpura, representing Khadoor Sahib, and ten others were convicted Wednesday for the molestation and assault of a Dalit woman in 2013. A Tarn Taran court will pronounce the sentence Friday. The survivor expressed relief, stating that her 13-year wait for justice had been fulfilled.

title: Top shares to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Top stock market recommendations: Nuvama Professional Clients Group's Aakash K Hindocha recommends buying Apl Apollo Tubes Ltd, Tata Motors, and Bharat Forge Ltd. Nifty is expected to consolidate between 24700 and 25100, while Bank Nifty could rally from 54100.

title: Meet Mandhira Kapur - Sunjay's sister, key in Rs 30k crore family dispute
content: The Kapur family is embroiled in an inheritance dispute over the late Sunjay Kapur's reported Rs 30,000 crore estate. Karisma Kapoor's children are contesting Sunjay's will, alleging forgery by their stepmother, Priya Kapur. Sunjay's sister, Mandhira Kapur, supports Karisma and her children, claiming they were wrongly excluded from the will.

title: Meet Tejasvi Manoj: Teen cybersecurity pioneer; recognised by TIME 2025
content: Inspired by her grandfather's near brush with an online scam, 16-year-old Tejasvi Manoj from Texas developed Shield Seniors. This platform educates and protects seniors from cybercrime, offering tools to identify scams and report fraud. Tejasvi, recognized as TIME's Kid of the Year 2025, aims to empower seniors to navigate the internet safely and confidently, reducing their vulnerability to financial exploitation.

title: Bengaluru school students 'sexually assault' Class 10 boy at hostel
content: A hostel warden from a Bengaluru international school has been arrested for allegedly abetting the sexual assault of a class 10 student. Six students, ranging from classes 10 to 12, are accused of sexually assaulting the boy and performing unnatural acts. The principal is also under investigation for failing to act on the victim's complaints.

title: Solar eclipse 2025: When and how to watch; India and worldwide guide
content: A partial solar eclipse will occur on September 21, 2025. It will be visible in the Southern Hemisphere. Key locations include New Zealand and eastern Australia. The Moon will partially block the Sun. Observers in India cannot view this eclipse. Safe viewing practices are essential. The event offers scientific study opportunities. It highlights orbital mechanics and shadow geometry.

title: IND vs UAE: Towel drama in Asia Cup! Third umpire rules OUT, but Suryakumar withdraws appeal
content: In an Asia Cup 2025 match, India defeated UAE by 9 wickets after Suryakumar Yadav withdrew an appeal, showing sportsmanship. UAE were bundled out for a mere 57, with Kuldeep Yadav claiming 4 wickets for 7 runs. Jasprit Bumrah's yorker dismissed UAE's top scorer, Alishan Sharafu.

title: 'Political assassination': Trump loyalist Charlie Kirk shot dead; key points
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was fatally shot during a speaking event at Utah Valley University, prompting a campus lockdown and a widespread search for the suspect. President Trump mourned Kirk's death, ordering flags to be flown at half-mast. The incident sparked condemnation from political leaders across the spectrum, highlighting concerns about political violence.

title: 'Alice' fame actress, Polly Holliday, passes away at 88
content: The entertainment world mourns the loss of Polly Holliday, the celebrated actress best known for her role as Florence Jean Castleberry in the sitcom 'Alice.' She passed away at 88 on September 9, 2025, at her Manhattan home.

title: Panchayat fails to resolve land feud, groups clash with bows, arrows & slings; 1 dead
content: A violent clash erupted between the Bhil and Bhilala tribal communities in Guna district, Madhya Pradesh, over a land dispute involving 60 hectares of forest. The conflict, employing traditional weapons, resulted in the death of 55-year-old Gangaram Bhil. Police have registered a case of murder and rioting against members of the Bhilala community, arresting two and seizing weapons.

title: 'Weather clear': Employer killed man over suspicion of affair with wife in UP
content: In a shocking turn of events, recovery agent Kunal Shukla was murdered by his employer, Vivek Singh, due to suspicions of an affair. Singh, along with accomplice Wasim Ali Khan, brutally killed Shukla in the Swastik Finance office. Police investigations revealed a meticulously planned crime, driven by jealousy and a promise of financial gain.

title: 'Great & legendary': Conservative activist Charlie Kirk shot dead; Trump mourns loss
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk tragically died after being shot at Utah Valley University during his college tour. The incident occurred when Kirk was questioned about mass shootings by transgender individuals. Videos captured the moment the bullet struck his neck, leading to his immediate hospitalization and subsequent death.

title: Brooks Nader dating Carlos Alcaraz? Sister Grace Ann's comments go viral
content: Brooks Nader's sister, Grace Ann, has confirmed the rumors of a connection between the model and tennis star Carlos Alcaraz. While clarifying that Carlos has met Brooks' other sisters, Grace Ann herself anticipates meeting him soon. Alcaraz, who expressed his desire for a relationship earlier this year, values family support amidst his demanding tennis career.

title: US: Three students shot at Denver high school
content: Three teenagers were shot at Evergreen High School near Denver, reviving Jefferson County‚Äôs long history of school gun violence since Columbine. Parents, students, and neighbors were left shaken as survivors recounted the chaos. While victims are recovering, the tragedy underscores America‚Äôs ongoing school safety crisis, sparking renewed questions about how many wake-up calls it will take for change.

title: ‚ÄòThe Bengal Files‚Äô collection day 6: Vivek Agnihotri‚Äôs film mints Rs 1 crore; crosses Rs 10 crore mark
content: Vivek Agnihotri's 'The Bengal Files,' starring Mithun Chakraborty and Anupam Kher, has grossed over Rs 10 crore at the Indian box office in its first six days. Despite a strong opening weekend, collections have slowed during the weekdays. The film, the third in Agnihotri's 'Files' trilogy, faces political challenges and a reduction in show numbers, impacting the director's future projects.

title: IND vs PAK: Gill's subtle two-word post stirs India-Pakistan fever
content: Kuldeep Yadav and Shivam Dube's exceptional bowling performances propelled India to a dominant nine-wicket victory over the United Arab Emirates in their Asia Cup 2025 opener. Kuldeep's impressive figures of 4 for 7 and Dube's 3 for 4 helped India dismiss UAE for a mere 57 runs. India chased down the target swiftly, reaching 60 for 1 in just 4.

title: IND vs UAE: After 7 long years, Kuldeep Yadav breaks T20I silence - here's how
content: Kuldeep Yadav's mesmerizing spin dismantled UAE, securing India a dominant nine-wicket victory in their Asia Cup 2025 opener. Kuldeep's remarkable 4 for 7 earned him Player of the Match after seven years. India chased down the target swiftly, setting the stage for a high-voltage clash against Pakistan.

title: Untold story! 'My mind wasn‚Äôt processing what Dhoni was saying': Rinku Singh
content: Rinku Singh disclosed his occasional phone conversations with MS Dhoni, where they delve into batting strategies and mental fortitude for high-pressure situations. Dhoni's advice emphasises maintaining composure and self-belief during crucial moments, particularly when batting in the lower middle order. Rinku also recounted his awestruck first encounter with Dhoni during an IPL match in Dubai.

title: NBA trade rumors: Warriors eye $91M Cavs star Jonathan Kuminga
content: The Golden State Warriors are reportedly finalizing a trade to acquire Jarrett Allen from the Cleveland Cavaliers, sending Jonathan Kuminga and draft picks in return. This move addresses Golden State's need for a strong frontcourt presence following Kevon Looney's departure. Cleveland aims to gain salary cap flexibility and focus on rebuilding around Donovan Mitchell and Evan Mobley.

title: MLB Trade Rumors: Why Chicago Cubs‚Äô Kyle Tucker could secure a $498mn contract
content: Kyle Tucker, acquired by the Chicago Cubs in a blockbuster trade, is at the center of a proposed $498 million contract extension. This 12-year deal would secure Tucker as the team's cornerstone, boosting fan engagement and postseason aspirations. While offering Tucker financial assurance and control, the contract presents potential payroll strain and risk of decline for the Cubs.

title: The great patch-up: Trump tempers tariff tantrum, re-engages a willing PM Modi
content: After weeks of tension and tariff threats, the US and India are tentatively re-engaging in trade talks, spurred by concerns in Washington that a hardline approach is pushing New Delhi closer to Russia and China. Despite President Trump's outreach and PM Modi's positive response, significant disagreements remain, particularly regarding trade barriers and India's purchase of Russian oil.

title: Kawhi Leonard picks Clippers: Avoids LeBron James; here's why
content: In 2019, Kawhi Leonard chose the Los Angeles Clippers over the Lakers. Reports suggest he avoided playing with LeBron James. He preferred being the main leader. Later, a controversy emerged regarding Leonard's deal with Aspiration. Allegations arose of a scheme to bypass the NBA salary cap. Steve Ballmer denied any involvement. The NBA is investigating the matter.

title: Nick Robertson‚Äôs Leafs future: Berube‚Äôs blunt message; role uncertain
content: Nick Robertson's place with the Toronto Maple Leafs is not guaranteed. He must prove himself at training camp. Coach Craig Berube emphasizes intense competition for roster spots. New additions to the team create a squeeze for Robertson. He needs a standout performance to secure his role. His future with the Leafs depends on it.

title: Who was Charlie Kirk? Trump ally shot during Utah campus event; Know all about him
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot Wednesday at Utah Valley University during an event. Kirk, CEO of Turning Point USA, sustained a gunshot wound near his neck and is in critical condition. Authorities have a suspect in custody following the incident at the Sorensen Center courtyard. Trump urged prayers for Kirk.

title: Shot fired from building? No clarity on Charlie Kirk's shooter
content: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk tragically died from a gunshot wound sustained during a tour stop at Utah Valley University. The shooting occurred while Kirk was addressing a question about mass shootings and transgender individuals. Confusion surrounds the shooter's identity and location, with conflicting reports about an arrest and whether the shooter was inside the event or nearby.

title: Why competitive exam aspirants are flocking to study spaces in Chennai
content: As you walk through Anna Nagar, you will find a private study hall on nearly every corner, offering a permanent reserved seat to any aspirant for a monthly fee. These packed spaces have become the go-to individual study spots for many students.

content: Resignation of former BJD Rajya Sabha MP and south Odisha strongman N. Bhaskar Rao is considered a jolt to the regional party

title: ECI targeted¬†Pawan Khera for posing questions: Congress

title: Airports may face fee cuts for poor passenger service
content: Regulatory body to appoint third party to monitor service delivery; airports that perform better will get a bonus

title: Evacuation plan ready to bring all Telugus stranded in Nepal back home, says Lokesh
content: 217 people from A.P. are in Nepal, says the RTGS Minister, adding that a flight will evacuate the stranded on Thursday

title: Meeting on September 16 to discuss ambiguities in new roster; DPAR asked to review
content: Officials of the DPAR, Social Welfare Department, State govt. representatives and members of the Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes Employees Association to attend

title: For Hindu Bengalis, CAA is irrelevant: Himanta Biswa Sarma
content: Himanta Biswa Sarma says Hindu Bengalis have not used the Citizenship (Amendment) Act route, because they are certain of their identity as citizens

title: Cabinet approves doubling of Bhagalpur‚ÄìDumka‚ÄìRampurhat single railway line costing ‚Çπ3,169 Crore
content: The enhanced line capacity will improve mobility, providing enhanced efficiency and service reliability, an Indian Railways spokesperson said

title: ‚ÄòDuped by agent, 15 Indians pinned down in Ukraine-Russia war zone‚Äô
content: All of them went to Moscow on student or visitor visa in the past six months. They are now stuck in the Donetsk region, say two of the recruits

title: Widespread protests by opposition against new security law¬†enacted in Maharashtra
content: The Maha Vikas Aghadi staged state-wide protests citing concerns over potential misuse of the law to suppress dissent. MVA leaders also questioned the need for a new law

title: India to send special flights to Nepal
content: Kathmandu‚Äôs Tribhovan International Airport resumed flight operations and various airlines announced resumption of flight services from September 11, 2025

title: ‚ÄòAustralia against U.S. tariffs, but QUAD remains relevant‚Äô
content: Philip Green, Australia‚Äôs High Commissioner to India and Bhutan, who was in Bengaluru recently, speaks in an exclusive interview with The Hindu

title: House panel members raise questions on non-tariff barriers for Indian agricultural exports to EU¬†
content: The meeting with Commerce Secretary comes a day before EU negotiators sit down with the Indian government to discuss EU-India Free Trade Agreement

title: Bombay HC grants bail to 2012 Pune blasts accused, cites 12 years‚Äô incarceration and trial delay
content: Court notes that only 27 of 170 witnesses had been examined in over 12 years, highlights the right to speedy trial as a fundamental right under Article 21

title: Supreme Court upholds Delhi High Court order to lodge FIR against two ex-CBI officers
content: Sometimes those who investigate must also be investigated, says the court, directing that the probe be  headed by an officer not below the rank of an Assistant Commissioner of Police

title: Congress Whip in Lok Sabha accuses the BJP of ‚Äòvote theft‚Äô in V-P election
content: The Opposition has started an informal probe on ‚Äòmissing‚Äô votes;¬†unable to account for three Shiv Sena (UBT), four AAP, and two NCP(SP) votes and one or two from the JMM, says one estimate; Congress is unable to account for one vote, SP for two

title: Indian Navy‚Äôs first training squadron arrives at R√©union island, Mauritius
content: The visit features professional interactions, including cross-training visits, joint diving exercises, yoga sessions, and sports fixtures, furthering the India-France naval partnership

title: Karnataka High Court recommends Central govt. to increase maintenance payable to parents by their children¬†¬†
content: ‚ÄòCeiling of ‚Çπ10,000 per month fixed 18 years ago under Maintenance and Welfare of Parents and Senior Citizens Act is too meagre in present cost inflation index‚Äô

title: IIT Palakkad partners with Buimerc for social entrepreneurship
content: The initiative aims to foster social entrepreneurship in Kerala, with plans to expand its reach nationwide

title: Radiant Kochi
content: Over 25 years, The Hindu has captured Kochi in its myriad colours and flavours, chronicling the city‚Äôs vibrant spirit and untold stories

title: Special educators‚Äô appointment: Kerala govt. yet to take follow-up steps on SC order
content: The State has over 1.23 lakh differently abled students, with more than 2,700 special educators currently working under Samagra Shiksha Kerala on a contract basis, according to an affidavit filed in the apex court

title: Real Madrid, Barcelona lead top men's and women's clubs in EA FC 26
content: soccer teams have received a star-based rating with a maximum of five stars . german and german leagues dominate the upper ranks in both men and women's soccer . the top 16 clubs in men's football have been unveiled by ea sports .

title: World Cup onside/offside: Good win for USMNT, last dance for Lionel Messi?
content: Mauricio Pochettino tinkered both in strategy and lineup to improve the agile, high-possession mentality of hajime Moriyasu's Japan . he went back to the playbook from his Southampton and Tottt . this week's world cup qualifiers took center stage .

title: WBC reveals championship ring for Canelo vs. Crawford fight
content: the undisputed super middleweight title fight between canelo alvarez and challenger Terence Crawford has a key piece of jewelry at stake . the ring, designed by WBC strategic partner Rasheen Farlow, is valued at over $100,000 . a collection of green stones makes up the trademark green belt in the center .

title: Fantasy reaction: Bigsby trade a boon to Etienne's fantasy value
content: fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . quarterback Brock Purdy is no expected to play in Week 2 due to toe and shoulder injuries suffered in Week 1 . head coach Kyle Shanahan says his absence could stretch beyond this week .

title: How competition -- in everything -- drives Crawford ahead of Canelo fight
content: TERENCE CRAWFORD 's EXISTENCE revolves around proving people wrong . terence crawfORD is a former two-division undisputed champion . it's not just winning at boxing, but at table tennis, chess, video games .

title: Survivor pool strategy: The top teams to take in Week 2
content: ESPN Eliminator Challenge is one of the most fun and simple games to play this season . the rules are simple: pick one team, and as long as they win (or tie), you advance to the next round . if they lose, you are out .

title: What makes a baseball player exciting? We asked two rising MLB stars
content: a baseball player bracket skews young, with the average age (26.4) more than two years younger than the MLB average (28.6) . the bracket embodies several common qualities among our 32 entrants . "i just like seeing guys who can do a lot of different things on the field," says a representative .

title: 'Nacua must mix his oatmeal with cement': Rams can't overstate WR's importance
content: los Angeles Rams wide receiver Davante Adams saw the collision in the middle of the field . he was taken to the locker room after a concussion and receiving stitches . the third-year receiver finished with 10 catches for 130 yards, by far the leading receiver .

title: MMA divisional rankings: How much did Nassourdine Imavov rise at middleweight?
content: Nassourdine Imavov beats caio Borralho in the uFC Fight Night main event . he moves up to no. 3 in the latest ESPN middleweight rankings . the other weight class in which rankings change is heavyweight, where Marcin Tybura drops out of the top 10 .

title: Pulisic rates 9/10 as win vs. Japan gets USMNT back on track
content: alejandro Zendejas and Folarin Balogun both score as the united states defeats Japan 2-0 . the men's national team quickly bounced back with a more proactive attack through an experimental 3-4-3 formation . in a first half, the home side created danger through high-pressing fullbacks Max Arfsten and Alex Freeman .

title: Bottom 10: The spitting distance between Florida and Arizona State
content: "Wounded arms must carry the load" is spitting off the edge of the world, out in the night . "spitting off the Edge of the World" is here at Bottom 10 Headquarters . Pat McAfee donates all the sleeves that he cuts off his shishi .

content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . payton Tolle was originally scheduled to start today's game in Sacramento with the Boston Red Sox attempting to sweep the Athletics .

title: Potential managerial and front office changes on the horizon
content: snitker will turn 70 next month . he'll move into a role with the team's front office . his son is now a hitting coach for the Houston Astros . the braves signed him to a free agent contract in 1977 .

title: Matchup rankings: Drake Maye, Ricky Pearsall stand out in Week 2
content: the matchup rankings provide a schedule-independent method to evaluate positional matchups each week . each defense fared relative to the difficulty of the schedule it has faced . for the first three weeks, these rankings are entirely my opinion of how favorable october .

title: NFL execs predict the biggest award winners: Picks for MVP, best rookies, more
